alert.note: Alert for Jack; Palo Pinto; Parker; Wise (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 20 at 5:41PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of western Wise, southeastern Jack, northwestern Parker and northeastern Palo Pinto Counties through 630 PM CDT... At 540 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Alvord to Lake Bridgeport to Graford. These storms are moving southeast around 5 mph. HAZARD...Isolated wind gusts of 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Mineral Wells, Decatur, Bridgeport, Alvord, Chico, Graford, Paradise, Poolville, Cottondale, Boonsville, Mineral Wells State Park, Runaway Bay and Lake Bridgeport. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. If on or near Lake Bridgeport, get out of the water and move indoors or inside a vehicle. Move to safe shelter now! Do not be caught on the water in a thunderstorm.
